Mark Frankel https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mark_Frankel 0 Mark Frankel (13 June 1962 – 24 September 1996) was a British actor, known for his leading roles in British film Leon the Pig Farmer and American TV series Kindred: The Embraced. Mark_Frankel ( 13_June_1962 – 24_September_1996 ) was a_British_actor , known for his_leading_roles in British_film Leon the_Pig_Farmer and American_TV_series_Kindred : The Embraced .
